definitions.title: vb. Niph. Hiph.
definitions.body: overhang, look out and down (NH Niph. Hiph. = BH; cf. Aram. [[שְׁקִיפָא]] , 4qiypo0.;, rocky pinnacle, rock, Ar. saqafa ceiling, roof, sky (on connex. of mngs.cf. Ar. 0’a4rafa overtop, overlook, from 4arufa be high; 0[it.=ala9a look down upon,  from t.ala9a rise);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נִשְׁקְפָה]] Ju Jdg 5:28+, [[וְנִשְׁâָקפָה]] Nu 21:20 (read prob. pt. [[הַגִּשְׁקָפָה]], cf. Nu 23:28, GBG); Is. [[נִשְׁקָָפְתּי]] Pr 7:6; Pt. [[נִשְׁקָף]] Nu 23:28, 1Sa 13:18, Ps 85:12; f. [[נִשְׁקָפָה]] Ct So 6:10;—lean over (and look), lookdown, c. [[בְּעַד]] of window, through Ju Jdg 5:28, 1Sa 2:16 = 1Ch 15:29, Pr 7:6; abs. look down, forth Ct So 6:10; c. [[מִן]] of direction whence Je 6:l Ps 85:12 (both fig.); of mt. lean over upon ([[עַל־פְּנֵי]]), overhang Nu 21:20, Nu 23:23, 1Sa 13:18 (read [[הַגֶּעַ]] for [[הגבול]] We Dr HPS al.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הִשְׁקִיף]] Ps 14:2 + ; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַשְׁקִיף]] La 3:50, [[וַיַּשְׁקֵף]] Ge 19:28+, etc.;Imv. ms. cohort. [[הַשְׁקִ֫יפָה]] De 26:15;—look down (=
